attributes.action: Scrap the England football team playing in white and navy! for White and Red
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we play in white and navy! the St George's cross is White and Red, they are OUR national colours and we won our only major championship in those colours. Have sense! Football's White and Red

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
